Title: In Cold Blood
Writer: Truman Capote (based on the book by), Richard Brooks (written for the screen by)
Actors: Robert Blake, Scott Wilson, John Forsythe, Paul Stewart
Plot: After a botched robbery results in the brutal murder of a rural family, two drifters elude police, in the end coming to terms with their own mortality and the repercussions of their vile atrocity.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 5 nominations.
